title: Pistachio and peanut butter cookies
ingredients: ['90g (3oz) self-raising flour', '90g (3oz) porridge oats', '90g (3oz) caster sugar', '1 handful roughly chopped pistachio nuts', '1 handful dried fruit', '90g (3oz) butter', '2 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 tablespoons milk', '50g chocolate (milk or white)']
